nodes.text: Docking bay 4414 was a hangar that was located in Cloud City, on the planet Bespin. In about 17 BBY, the Hutt crime lord Darga Jiramma Mionne settled on Cloud City and he used docking bay 4414 as his base of operations, keeping his Personal Luxury Yacht 3000 Glorious Chariot and several Z-95 Headhunters in the bay. A group of Alderaanian Resistance agents traveled to Cloud City in search of Darga, and they eventually located him and confronted Darga and the Hutt's forces in docking bay 4414.
